description:
Now You Too Can Become A Hypnotist Even If You Have Never Heard Of Hypnosis Before

A Practical And Fast Way To Learn Hypnosis Now!

    -hypnotize people

    -Minimum theory, maximum exercises

    -create a script on the fly so that you never run out of words

    -amaze people at a party with some easy to do hypnosis performances

You are here because you are interested in becoming hypnotist.

But most of the courses out there just simply don’t cut it for you.

They are too expensive and too extensive.

You simply don’t have the time or money for it.

You are sick of learning a lot of theory and just want to get into hypnotizing people.

Yet you want to get started on this amazing journey to become a master hypnotist?

The Solution

I have the perfect product for you but before we get to it lets just imagine that one day you will be like that hypnotist or person that got you interested in this field.

How you will stand there and be admired by people around you asking themselves how the hell you just did that.

How you will have the confidence to just hypnotize someone when being asked for it.

Guess what I was in the same spot as you.

I first became interested in hypnosis when I watched TV and saw The Mentalist.

I became interested and googled what was out there.

Unfortunately at that time there was no low cost and easy way to learn hypnosis.

Most courses were expensive and quite extensive.

What I wanted is to be able to get to hypnotize someone as quickly as possible.

I wasn’t interested in all the theory.

I just wanted something practical that gets me started quickly!

So now that I have become a hypnotist myself, with my own Hypnotherapy Clinique in Zürich and also became a teacher in the major hypnosis school in Switzerland I decided it is time now to provide you what I have missed back then.

To learn the skills I have purchased countless DVDs and visited seminars all over the place.

It has cost me a fortune to get where I am now.

And the acquired knowledge I have now condensed into an easy and fast step by step course to get you the skill to hypnotize people as quickly as possible.

You see I want you to have the amazing tool of hypnosis at your fingertips.

More, I want you to have it as quickly as possible without losing important material on the way.

And that’s why I have created the course:

Hypnosis Crash Course: Become A Hypnotist In Two Hours


After this course you will be able to:

    -hypnotize people

    -create a script on the fly so that you never run out of words

    -amaze people at a party with some easy to do hypnosis performances

    -Improve peoples lives around you by giving them a covert hypnotic benediction!

    -Prepare your subject properly before you delve into your hypnosis-magic

    -Get yourself in the right state to perform at your best.

You will learn:

    -what hypnosis is and what it isn’t

    -the distinction between conscious and unconscious mind

    -how you quickly can improve your skills as a hypnotist

    -Safety precautions you need to be aware off

    -Exercises you can do to hone your skills

    -The principals that ANY hypnotic interaction or induction has

Sounds pretty good, right?

Well it is not everything.

Because I have designed this course to make it easy for you to learn hypnosis.

There is no need to be stressed out about anything since the exercises are broken down into little pieces so that you can do it one piece at a time and then combine it to a whole.

Other benefits of this course:

    -it is easy to follow

    -it is step by step

    -anyone can do it who understands English well enough

    -it is low prized

    -it condenses the material down to the most important concepts so that you can get started right away

    -it has lots of exercises to get you started

    -it has exercises to hone your skills and improve it

This is quite an impressive list, if you consider that this is only a crash course.

But I wanted to make sure that you do get the best out of it to make this a good and enjoyable start into your hypnosis career.

You will be lead several times through hypnosis inductions to make your learning easier and more natural.

You see, we all learn a lot unconsciously.

Most, if not all, of our nonverbal communication has been learned unconsciously and the same I want to give you with this course.

So that when you finish this course you will have learned a lot more than what you consciously are aware off.

This course is perfect suited for you if:

    -you are interested in or curious about hypnosis

    -you want to quickly start hypnotizing people

    -you have heard or seen hypnosis in action and you would like to try it out. But you are not ready to buy one of those bigger courses out there

    -you want to figure out if that hypnosis thing is something for you

    -you are looking for a short course that will get you started on your path to hypnosis mastery

    -you know that this is a crash course and teaches you only a few fundamentals

This course might NOT be for everyone!

    -If you are already a hypnotherapist or you have been trained in some other form of hypnosis I would not recommend this course to you.

    -If you don’t have any interest in hypnosis

    -If you want to abuse hypnosis. Because lets face it, it is a pretty powerful tool when used appropriately. That’s why I only want people to buy it who actually will use it to be a force for good.

    -If you will not do the exercises appropriately.

I want that every customer will enjoy the experience of going through this course.

If you are already advanced you will be bored.

That’s why I have outlined above for whom this course is and for whom it is not.

What else to expect about the course:

This course is:

    -a beginner course

    -an introduction

    -low priced

    -teaching you fundamentals to get you started as quickly as possible

    -practice oriented, I keep the theory to a minimum

This course is NOT:

    -a certification course

    -going to teach you any therapeutic processes

    -a full program to become a stage, street or hypnotherapist

    -going to make you a master in hypnosis. It is a starting point

I hope through those few points you are now ready to decide if this is something for you or not.

You see I don’t want to sell this course to anyone.

I want that you get the most out of it.

That you feel like this was totally worth your time and money!

You will be taught through:

    -video

    -exercises

    -pdf

You need:

    -someone you can do the exercises with

    -the willingness to put in the work that is required for the course and after

Just imagine how it will feel like when you have put someone into a trance the first time.

Just imagine how it will feel like when putting someone into trance becomes as easy as putting on your underwear.

Just imagine how you will feel, when you are standing there being admired or thanked for your amazing skills.

Guess what I give you the start here!

You can only climb a mountain or explore a new and exciting country by taking the first step!

The Hypnosis Crash Course: Become A Hypnotist In Two Hours is the first step to explore the country of hypnosis.

Let me show you around.

Click here now to get started on your exciting journey to hypnosis mastery!
title: Hypnosis Crash Course
